Key Match Events: Mikautadze scored a penalty in the 57th minute
Mekvabishvili received a red card in the 85th minute
Ronaldo received a yellow card in the 28th minute
Neto received a yellow card in the 44th minute
Neves received a yellow card in the 53rd minute
Pre-Game Insights: Portugal is set to make a couple of alterations to their starting XI for the clash with Georgia
Rafael Leao is unavailable due to his second caution of the tournament
Joao Felix or Pedro Neto is likely to start on the left flank
Nelson Semedo could replace Nuno Mendes in the defense
Francisco Conceicao and Joao Palhinha are one yellow card away from suspension
Cristiano Ronaldo could make his 50th appearance at a major tournament if selected
Bruno Fernandes and Bernardo Silva are expected to start after scoring against Turkey
